headline: Veeva Systems Inc. (VEEV): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Veeva Systems Inc. on LongTermValue Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VEEV. Veeva Systems Inc.’s share was trading at $203.92 as of January 30th. VEEV’s trailing and forward P/E were 40.93 and 24.33 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Veeva Systems (VEEV) is a leading vertical […]

headline: Salesforce’s Army Cloud Deal And Wildfire Venture Versus Recent Stock Weakness
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) has secured a $5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to modernize operations using cloud and AI via its subsidiary Computable Insights LLC. The company is also launching EMBERPOINT LLC with Lockheed Martin, PG&E Corporation, and Wells Fargo to apply AI and data tools to wildfire detection, prevention, and emergency response. These moves extend Salesforce's reach into public sector modernization and emergency management alongside its core enterprise software...
